attributes.action: Members of Parliament saleries should only be the average National salary (£23700) pa
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's are completely out of touch in this Country.They have no idea what a struggle it is survive on the wages normal hard working people have to live on.Tax and the cost of living is out of control in this Country,but our poor MP's,they don't struggle they award themselves huge pension,salary and perks packages.They tell us times are going to be hard and painful,lets give them the opportunity to show solidarity and join us in these dark days and save huge amounts of tax payer money.Vote for the basic salary of an MP to be the same as the National average salary,currently £23700 pa.
